wavy.label: Wavy Heart Line

analysisSection.title: Palm Analysis
analysisSection.dropText: Click or drag and drop your palm photo here
analysisSection.recommendText: Recommended: Clear front view of palm, no shadows, in natural light

about.title: About Us
about.description1: The Palm Destiny Analysis platform combines traditional Eastern wisdom with modern computer vision technology to provide you with a scientific and personalized palm analysis service.
about.description2: Our technical team consists of palmistry experts and artificial intelligence engineers who have jointly developed this unique analysis system.
about.disclaimer: Please note: The analysis provided by this platform is for entertainment and reference purposes only and should not be considered professional advice or prediction.
about.quote: "Combining ancient wisdom with modern technology to explore life's mysteries"
